title: Passes Don't Show up When Holding Power Button
content: I just updated my Pixel 3a to the new March Feature Drop and I notice my passes are not showing up under the new "power hold" menu. I've never used Google Pay before but I thought I'd give it a try with this new feature. I added my gym membership (it's a bar code) to Google Pay but it is not showing up in the new menu. All I see is the message saying "Add payment method". If I open the app however, I can see it and use it fine. Not a deal breaking issue, but one that is annoying.
